resources.string: If you have one, enter your Genius token here
Try this if you start getting invalid lyrics in Power Ampache
This plugin integrates seamlessly with Power Ampache 2. Once installed, no additional setup is required ‚Äî it will begin working automatically within the app.

By default, the plugin uses the Power Ampache 2 owned Genius token to fetch lyrics. However, you can enter your own token in the provided text box. This is recommended if the default one gets rate-limited by Genius.

If you start noticing missing or inconsistent lyrics, try using the "Clear Stored Lyrics" button to reset the local lyrics cache. This often resolves temporary issues with fetching or displaying lyrics.
